Model.matrix method for fitted spbp models

Source: R/utils2.R
model.matrix.spbp.Rd

Model.matrix of a fitted spbp model.

# S3 method for spbp
model.matrix(
  object,
  data = eval(object$call$data, envir = parent.frame()),
  ...
)

Arguments

object

an object of class `spbp`, see spbp.
data

data.frame object.
...

arguments inherent from model.matrix.

Value

The explanatory variables matrix.

See also

spbp, model.matrix

Examples



library("spsurv")
data("veteran")

fit <- bpph(Surv(time, status) ~ karno + factor(celltype),
data = veteran)
#> Priors are ignored due to mle approach.

model.matrix(fit)
#>     karno factor(celltype)smallcell factor(celltype)adeno factor(celltype)large
